description:
The recently released trailer for Disney’s upcoming live-action adaptation of Snow White offers a first look at the studio’s latest reimagining of a classic tale. Directed by Marc Webb, the film aims to present a new interpretation of the story while retaining elements familiar to audiences who know the original. The trailer begins with a [...]

The post First Trailer Released For Disney’s ‘Snow White’ Live-Action Movie appeared first on ScreenGeek.
title: First Trailer Released For Disney’s ‘Snow White’ Live-Action Movie
